diagnosis.final_diagnosis: familial hypomagnesemia with hypercalciuria and nephrocalcinosis (FHHNC)
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Primary hypomagnesemia, Secondary hypocalcemia due to TRPM6 mutation, Bartter syndrome, Gitelman syndrome.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Diagnostic confirmation of FHHNC was established through urine and blood analysis showing typical signs for the condition, with the presence of a novel mutation in the CLDN16 gene (Y207X) in both siblings, and clinical presentations including hypocalcemic seizures and nephrocalcinosis.
